price: 8. En Moesa zei: “Als jullie ongelovig zijn, jullie en allen op de aarde tezamen, dan voorwaar! Allah is rijk, Eigenaar van alle lofprijzingen.”
arabic: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰٓ إِن تَكۡفُرُوٓاْ أَنتُمۡ وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَنِيٌّ حَمِيدٌ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: waqāla mūsā in takfurū antum waman fī al-arḍi jamīʿan fa-inna al-laha laghaniyyun ḥamīdun
